description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Pork Slider With Gorgonzola Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pulled Pork Slider With Gorgonzola Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pull shreds of hot roast pork with a fork and place on the base of the slider roll.

Top with coleslaw and grated gorgonzola cheese. Note: This recipe requires 1 x Woolworths Hot Roast Pork, which is available in-store only at this stage. Boneless Roast Pork Shoulder is suggested as an alternative ingredient if you want to shop online.
